abstract: New York Yankees pitcher A J Burnett is preparing for Game 4 of American League division series against Detroit Tigers; Burnett is confident in his abilities despite his poor earned run average.
snippet: The suspension of Game 1 upset the Yankees’ pitching plans and compelled them to turn to the erratic A. J. Burnett.
lead_paragraph: The suspension of Game 1 upset the Yankees’ pitching plans and compelled them to turn to the erratic A. J. Burnett.

headline.main: Confident Burnett Puts Uneven Year Behind Him
headline.print_headline: Running Out of Options: Confident Burnett Puts Uneven Year Behind Him
headline.seo: Confident Burnett Puts Uneven Year Behind Him
